gw.bizrules.system

Class BizRulesConfigParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.system.BizRulesConfigParameters

  • public class BizRulesConfigParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration parameters related to Business Rules

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IntegerParameterKey BizRulesCacheStaleTimeMinutes
      Time (in minutes) since last write before cached items are considered stale and eligible for reaping.
      static BooleanParameterKey BizRulesDeploymentEnabled
      Whether business rules must be explicitly deployed on the system before they can be evaluated.
      static StringParameterKey BizRulesDeploymentId
      The unique identifier for deployed system.
      static BooleanParameterKey BizRulesEnabled
      Whether business rules are used or not.
      static BooleanParameterKey BizRulesImportBootstrapRules
      Whether business rules must be imported from config/import/bizrules location when the server was started with an empty database.
      static IntegerParameterKey BizRulesLeafSearchNumOfHops
      Max. number of hops leaf search should search through to suggest matching results.
      static BooleanParameterKey BulkLoadRuleHeadByIdCacheEnabled
      Whether the business rules version controller's rule head cache is populated via a single query rather than waiting for it to be populated by individual queries.
      static StringParameterKey OnlineJavadocPrefix
      Prefix to URL where to find Javadoc.
      static BooleanParameterKey PreloadBizRulesBeansCacheEnabled
      Whether the business rules cache is initialized with the entire rule graph for all rule versions that could execute in the application

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ParameterKey> getAllKeys() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • BizRulesEnabled

        public static final BooleanParameterKey BizRulesEnabled
        Whether business rules are used or not.

      • OnlineJavadocPrefix

        public static final StringParameterKey OnlineJavadocPrefix
        Prefix to URL where to find Javadoc. It is recommended that this point to a local instance. It cannot use the file protocol due to Javascript security.

      • BizRulesDeploymentEnabled

        public static final BooleanParameterKey BizRulesDeploymentEnabled
        Whether business rules must be explicitly deployed on the system before they can be evaluated.

      • BizRulesDeploymentId

        public static final StringParameterKey BizRulesDeploymentId
        The unique identifier for deployed system. The parameter is used only when BizRulesDeploymentEnabled is true.

      • BizRulesLeafSearchNumOfHops

        public static final IntegerParameterKey BizRulesLeafSearchNumOfHops
        Max. number of hops leaf search should search through to suggest matching results. Default is 3

      • BizRulesImportBootstrapRules

        public static final BooleanParameterKey BizRulesImportBootstrapRules
        Whether business rules must be imported from config/import/bizrules location when the server was started with an empty database. Default is false

      • BizRulesCacheStaleTimeMinutes

        public static final IntegerParameterKey BizRulesCacheStaleTimeMinutes
        Time (in minutes) since last write before cached items are considered stale and eligible for reaping.

      • PreloadBizRulesBeansCacheEnabled

        public static final BooleanParameterKey PreloadBizRulesBeansCacheEnabled
        Whether the business rules cache is initialized with the entire rule graph for all rule versions that could execute in the application

      • BulkLoadRuleHeadByIdCacheEnabled

        public static final BooleanParameterKey BulkLoadRuleHeadByIdCacheEnabled
        Whether the business rules version controller's rule head cache is populated via a single query rather than waiting for it to be populated by individual queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllKeys

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ParameterKey> getAllKeys()
        Returns:
        a map of all parameters related to Business Rules
